messages.subject: Samurai Archives Summer Sale
messages.msgSnippet: For anyone interested, a summer sale at the Samurai Archives store: LOL Summer Sale Enjoy the LOL Summer Sale! The sale will end 7/14/05. Coupon code: LOLSAV
messages.messageBody:
For anyone interested, a summer sale at the Samurai Archives store:

'LOL' Summer Sale
Enjoy the LOL Summer Sale! The sale will end 7/14/05.
Coupon code: LOLSAV
$3 off all apparel
http://www.cafepress.com/samuraiarchives

(Don't ask me where they got the name)
